channel.title: Completed Game
channel.description: As title, now do I need to back up any saves etc to continue when rest of game is released as no doubt I will have formatted by then or on new hardware.

item.title: Completed Game
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
You could always just leave your saves and use this command to unlock the new chapters.

sv_unlockedchapters 15

That way you could just start a new game at Xen without having to replay the game or worry about saves.

Read full topic

item.title: Completed Game
item.dc:creator: karotiv
item.description:
Roland:

I know I am going to play through again when Xen is released. Hopefully the devs will have fixed the laggy finale by then as well.

thats your pc bro, i had no lag on maxed out graps, but my gaming pc is high end.

Read full topic

item.title: Completed Game
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
Oh, true that. I guess I’ll probs still keep a save just in case, but yeah, it will most likely be better to start again. Hopefully some bugs will have been fixed, too.

Read full topic

item.title: Completed Game
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I’m playing it through from the start, I don’t recommend keeping your saves for a future version because they probably won’t work properly since savegames hate changes in the level.

Read full topic
